structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: All proceedings, acts and things heretofore undertaken, performed or done in or for the authorization, issuance, execution and delivery of notes and bonds by housing authorities for the purpose of financing or aiding in the development or construction of housing and all notes and bonds heretofore issued by housing authorities are hereby validated, ratified, confirmed, approved and declared legal in all respects, notwithstanding any defect or irregularity therein or any want of statutory authority.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 16, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 4. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 71, sec. 3.
